title: Is there people who took a drop in pesu in cse.

comments.body: Pichle saal hi to liya tha na , newspaper pe bhi aaya ta
If you mean by dropping out of the course, many do after first year, the numbers are lesser in the coming years .
Yeah, 2 of my cse friends dropped out after sem 1. One went to BBA and the other joined Manipal. Why, are u considering dropping out?
